metadata.title: CVE-2018-4180 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In macOS High Sierra before 10.13.5, an issue existed in CUPS. This issuewas addressed with improved access restrictions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4180` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
cups-bsd - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
cups-client - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
cups-common - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
cups-core-drivers - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
cups-daemon - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
cups-ipp-utils - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
cups-ppdc - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
cups-server-common - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
libcups2 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
libcupscgi1 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
libcupsimage2 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
libcupsmime1 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
libcupsppdc1 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cups package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.3-4ubuntu0.5').
